channel.title: Register page to my rsc server
channel.description:
Well i got the page files ,i have no idea how to make it,but i know i have to put the files somewhere...i dont know where
I Have XAMPP,it has mysql,phpmyadmin etc... now post how to make it

item.title: Register page to my rsc server
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“kloplop321, post:6, topic:163492”][quote author=error.login link=topic=222181.msg1921836#msg1921836 date=1197221005]
ask the plan pony

[size=4pt]C:\xampp\htdocs[/size]
[/quote]
spham much?(yes, spham)

Why are you even making one when you clearly have no idea about anything?

he is asking for help, it seems you have earned the “java guru” award, and since runescape is javabased, why not help him since this forum is not meant for flaming. This forum is for helping others be productive.

I would help but I honestly do not know how.[/quote]
What he`s talking about is actually web-based.

But .Fusion is most likely correct, everything you put in htdocs will appear on your server.

Read full topic
